XI.iii.1.B.5.f
.
Eligible Claimant’s Loyalty Clearance When Buried in a State Veterans Cemetery
Loyalty clearance will be necessary only when a Veteran is buried in a State Veterans cemetery or other cemetery as listed in
38 CFR 3.1707(b)
or
38 U.S.C. 2303(b)(1)
, and Veteran forfeiture may be declared under
38 CFR 3.902(d)
.
Do
not
delay awarding burial benefits pending receipt of formal loyalty clearance, in connection with claims for accrued benefits payable, on the basis of relationship.
References
:  For more information on
Philippine loyalty clearance, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, 4.C.1
, and
loyalty clearance requirements, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, 3.B.6
.
